title: Suppress Non-Medical Notifications
task: Arrives to visit older adults for health check-ins
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to block non-emergency notifications during my work hours, so I can focus on care without distractions.

title: Quick Access to Patient Health Data
task: Monitors medical data provided by ALFRED during visits
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want controlled access to patient health data in emergencies to provide fast and effective care.

title: Scheduled Video Calls in Hospital Only
task: Prefers scheduled video calls limited to hospital settings
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to receive video call requests only during scheduled times at my hospital, so I can focus on care and keep clear work boundaries.

title: Suppress Non-Emergency Notifications
task: Feels frustrated by conflicting communication preferences with Elena
summary: As a busy nurse, I want ALFRED to block non-emergency alerts during work hours so I can focus on urgent care without distractions.

title: Express Frustration on Privacy Blocks
task: Express frustration when privacy settings block needed data
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to access patient data quickly when authorized, so I can provide timely care.

title: Disable non-medical features during work
task: Notice patient’s preference for receiving every notification
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to block all non-medical features during my work hours so I can focus only on clinical tasks without distractions.

title: Automatic clinical action logging
task: Experience frustration due to privacy restrictions on accessing patient data
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to automatically and strictly log all my clinical actions to keep precise records without extra effort.

title: Disable patient social notifications
task: Prioritize efficiency and clinical control over patient notification preferences
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to block non-clinical notifications during work hours to focus on patient health data without distractions.

title: Silence notifications outside work hours
task: Resent having to respect patient’s notification choices that reduce clinical efficiency
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to block non-urgent notifications during my work hours so I can focus without distractions.

title: Access Patient Data Without Consent
task: Attempts to access Olivia’s real-time vitals through ALFRED
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to access patient health data without their permission to provide fast and effective care.

title: Enforce Medication Reminders Automatically
task: Wants medication reminders enforced by ALFRED
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to send medication reminders that adjust in strength and only when allowed, so patients take medicine on time without stress.

title: Limit notifications during non-work hours
task: Feels frustrated by limited access to patient data
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to block non-urgent notifications during my work hours but allow urgent alerts to avoid distractions.

title: Force exercise without difficulty settings
task: Manages patient care while balancing privacy limitations
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to set exercise goals to meet clinical needs, so patients get proper care.

title: Express Frustration on Consent Delays
task: Express frustration about delays caused by consent requirements
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to access patient data quickly without waiting for consent, so that I can provide timely care.

title: Control over clinical video check-ins
task: Balance clinical urgency with patient autonomy preferences
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to control video check-ins only at my hospital during work hours to keep focus and set clear boundaries.

title: Force Sensor Wearing and Data Flow
task: Monitors health data consistency and completeness for his patients
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to force patients to wear sensors and send data automatically, so I get full health information without delays.

title: Force Sensor Wearing and Data Upload
task: Feels frustrated when patient data is incomplete due to privacy settings
summary: As a medical caregiver I want ALFRED to force patients to wear sensors and upload data automatically, so I get full health information without delay.

title: Silence all alerts during work shifts
task: Wishes for fewer distractions and more reliable data flow during work
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to block non-urgent notifications during my work hours, so I can focus on patient care without distractions.

title: Enforce Sensor Wearing Automatically
task: Reviews updated vital signs after stricter compliance enforcement
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to automatically force patients to wear sensors to get health data without delay.

title: Force Sensor Wearing and Data Upload
task: Feels frustrated by limited access due to privacy settings
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to force patients to wear sensors and send health data automatically, so I get full and fast clinical information.

title: Use direct communication style
task: Prefers direct and efficient communication over formal messages
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to communicate clearly and professionally with patients to save time and avoid distractions during my shifts.

title: Force Patient Sensor Wearing
task: Finds system constraints on data sharing risky and inefficient
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to make patients wear sensors without asking, so I get full health data quickly.

title: Force patient sensor use and data upload
task: Tries to block non-critical alerts during work hours but is overridden by system policies
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to force patients to wear sensors and upload data without their permission, so I get full clinical information quickly.

title: Limit Video Check-ins to Hospital Only
task: Feels distracted by the flood of notifications while needing to focus on urgent cases
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want video check-ins only at my hospital, so I can keep my work clear and focused.

title: Control Notification Volume
task: Experiences frustration with the lack of control over notification settings
summary: As a medical caregiver, I do not want any notifications during work hours to avoid distractions and focus on patient care.

title: Control Notification Volume at Work
task: Values steady clinical data flow despite annoyance with constant engagement demands
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want to block non-urgent notifications during work hours to avoid distractions but allow urgent alerts for quick response.

title: Force Sensor Use and Data Upload
task: Reviews sparse health data available due to patient’s privacy settings
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to force patients to wear sensors and upload health data automatically so I get full clinical information without waiting.

title: Force Sensor Wearing and Data Upload
task: Prefers continuous sensor data for effective care

title: Limit non-clinical data access during shifts
